entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
